title: Angela's Awesome Chicken Enchiladas Recipe
description: These chicken enchiladas are easy to make with tortillas and a creamy chicken filling flavored with spicy seasonings, green chiles, and cheese.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Mexican Main Dishes Enchilada Recipes Chicken Angela's Awesome Chicken Enchiladas 4.8 (3,182) 2,221 Reviews 392 Photos These chicken enchiladas are easy to make with tortillas and a creamy chicken filling flavored with the perfect amount of seasonings, green chiles, and cheese. The secret is in the seasonings! Delicious with sour cream and a side of Mexican rice. Submitted by MomSavedbyGrace Updated on April 23, 2025 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 392 392 392 392 Prep Time: 45 mins Cook Time: 1 hr 5 mins Additional Time: 5 mins Total Time: 1 hr 55 mins Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cut into chunks 1 ¼ cups sour cream 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup ¼ teaspoon chili powder 1 tablespoon butter 1 small onion, chopped 1 cup water 1 bunch green onions, chopped, divided 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chiles, drained 1 (1.25 ounce) package mild taco seasoning mix 1 teaspoon lime juice ½ teaspoon onion powder ½ teaspoon garlic powder 5 (12-inch) flour tortillas 3 cups shredded Cheddar cheese 1 (10 ounce) can enchilada sauce 1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained Directions Place chicken into a large pot and add water to cover. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until chicken is no longer pink and the juices run clear, about 10 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Remove from the pot and let sit until cool enough to handle, 5 to 10 minutes. Shred chicken with two forks. Combine sour cream, condensed soup, and chili powder in a saucepan. Bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, then turn off the heat and cover to keep warm. At the same time, melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion; cook and stir until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add shredded chicken, water, 1/2 of the green onions, green chiles, and taco seasoning; simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in lime juice, onion powder, and garlic powder; simmer for 10 more minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Stir 1 cup soup mixture into the skillet with the chicken. Spread remaining soup mixture over the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish. Fill each tortilla with 1/5 of the chicken mixture and about 5 tablespoons Cheddar cheese. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Roll tortillas around filling and place enchiladas, seam-side down, into the baking dish. Pour enchilada sauce over top and sprinkle with remaining Cheddar, remaining green onions, and olives. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until filling is heated through and cheese is melted and bubbling, about 25 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook’s Note Shredding the chicken is the most time-consuming step, so you could use a rotisserie chicken to speed things up. I Made It Print 4,353 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 710 Calories 36g Fat 53g Carbs 42g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 8 Calories 710 % Daily Value * Total Fat 36g 47% Saturated Fat 18g 88% Cholesterol 126mg 42% Sodium 1765mg 77% Total Carbohydrate 53g 19% Dietary Fiber 4g 16% Total Sugars 4g Protein 42g 84% Vitamin C 19mg 21% Calcium 509mg 39% Iron 5mg 30% Potassium 590mg 13% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Angela's Awesome Chicken Enchiladas 01 of 392 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 392 Photo by  GentlePita5651 02/24/2025 A keeper! Took out the olives 03 of 392 Photo by  AE Williams 08/26/2024 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow Worth the effort Family favorite Crowd-pleaser Williams Family favorite!! 04 of 392 Photo by  MANDT2 01/16/2024 Very good. I used green salsa Verde instead of enchilada sauce because it was what I had on hand. This dish has a subtle, refreshing citrus undernote. 05 of 392 Photo by  Morgan B 07/04/2022 Absolutely delicious! 06 of 392 Photo by  Jarrod Callahan 09/07/2021 Doubled the recipe and made a batch of green and a batch of red. Also used low carb tortillas and salted the water for boiling the chicken. One of the best things I have ever made! 07 of 392 Photo by  jenn Smash 08/26/2021 08 of 392 Photo by  Angela Hamm 08/19/2021 09 of 392 Photo by  Nicholas Baragas 04/20/2021 10 of 392 Photo by  Alyssa 04/02/2021 i love this recipe i would just cook them for 5 minutes then put the sauce on the put them back in for 20 minutes 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Healthier Chicken Enchiladas 81 Ratings Chicken Enchiladas with Cream of Chicken Soup 1,516 Ratings Enchanted Sour Cream Chicken Enchiladas 235 Ratings Chicken Enchiladas with Creamy Green Chile Sauce 410 Ratings Easy Chicken Enchiladas from Reynolds 10 Ratings Jalapeño Cream Cheese Chicken Enchiladas 566 Ratings Chicken Enchiladas 3,095 Ratings Ultimate Creamy Chicken Enchiladas 39 Ratings Spinach and Chicken Enchiladas 76 Ratings Funky Enchilada Casserole 76 Ratings Chicken Enchiladas Suizas 107 Ratings Homemade Chicken Enchiladas 123 Ratings Honey-Lime Chicken Enchiladas 33 Ratings Grandma Kay's Chicken Enchiladas 38 Ratings Easy Enchilada Casserole 159 Ratings Layered Chicken and Black Bean Enchilada Casserole 842 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
